name: Private Renolds
descriptions: Private Renolds is an NCR trooper on a road west of Techatticup Mine in 2281.

Renolds and his squad were recently ambushed by Caesar's Legion and taken captive in the mine farther down the road. Renolds was able to escape but two of his fellow troopers remain in captivity. He states that "bastard Alexus" is responsible for the ambush.

If the player character rescues the hostages before talking to Renolds, they can respond to his request by saying, "were they the hostages in the mine?" This will garner surprise and appreciation from him.

topics.response_text: Thank goodness you're here. My squad needs help.

topics.topic_text: Why are you out here alone?
topics.response_text: My squad was ambushed by a Legion party lead by that bastard Alexus.
If you want to be that way I'll leave you alone.

topics.topic_text: I'll take a look and see if there's anything I can do.
topics.response_text: That's already more than I was expecting. I'll keep watch to make sure no more Legion come up the road. Good Luck.
There's a slim chance. But if the Legion wanted us dead, our heads would already be on pikes.

topics.topic_text: Extra encouragement would also increase their chances.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] I understand. Here's what I have on me. Now go before it's too late.

topics.topic_text: The odds are too small. You're on your own.
topics.response_text: There's no way I can take on the Legion by myself. I'll be here if you change your mind.

topics.topic_text: I changed my mind. I'll save your squad.
topics.response_text: Really? I can't thank you enough. I'll wait here and watch the road. Good luck in there.
They must have run straight back to camp. I bet they didn't even stop and say thanks.
Can you hurry? I know those Legion bastards are tough but my friends won't last long with all the radiation in there.

topics.topic_text: Were they the NCR hostages in the mine?
topics.response_text: Were? What do you mean were?
Legion bastards. They'll pay for that.
I was worried Alexus had already thrown them down a mineshaft. I'll run by camp and see how they're doing when I get a chance. Thanks for the help.
